name: Finis Lux
description:
A game created in Mexico City as a part of the Gr8ArtGames gamejam series by Goethe-Institute and Maschinen-Mensch

Short:

Ideologies that spread region of the world transforming the future of humanity.

Long:

Ideologies that spread region of the world transforming the future of humanity. One side, the origin of the Prehispanic culture that tend to be destroy by populism, racism and media controll.

Credits:

Ariel Sayán (Ariel Sorpresa), Christian Eduardo Rodríguez Palacios, Daniel López Salas, Salvador Servín Mejía
